channel.title: Fastest Food Ever
channel.description:
What is fast food? It's not just food that appears in less than forty five seconds after you shove money into the greasy illegal hands of that guy behind the counter, it's deep fat fried food made from dead stoner animals. That's the traditional definition at least, but fuck that human growth hormone injected grain eating bullshit, let Paultee show you where the good shits at.
Breakfast: Go into a coffee shop which has sugar water or honey in a squeezer and suck like it was your moms tit keep going and chug some millk and run on down to an Au Bon Pain or similar bakery/bread/soup/sandwhich place and get some butter packets. Eat the butter. Now go outside and pick up a really big rock and eat some bugs for protein. Tastier than bacon!
Lunch: Go to McDonalds and stick your head under the ketchup dispenser (optional: take packets) and drink untill the police come. When the cops come is when you leave and go to a video store. Find the microwave popcorn at the video store and open it up and eat it straight from the packet raw while you walk around the store and pick out a huge stack of videos. When you get to the rental counter with an empty packet of popcorn and a huge stack of videos say you forgot your wallet and waltz out.
Dinner: Find a cup lying on the ground and go to a Burger King and fill it up with soda from the dispensers then leave. Go to a mall and get free samples at the food court if possible for orderves. Then head to Wendy's and wait untill there are a big line of cars. Hide carefully in the bush (there is always a bush) near the window. Listen untill you hear somebody pay for a big order. Put on your Richard Nixon mask. Run out and grab the order, then run down your planned escape route (you have one of those, right?) and then hide the food in your stash spot. Change your shirt and your pants. You do have a spare set at your stash spot right? You shall then proceed to run back out toward Wendy's and say "I almost got the bastard but the filthy fast food freak escaped!".

item.title: Fastest Food Ever
item.dc:creator: @VB6_FTW VB6 FTW
item.description:
@VB6_FTW wrote:

I eat serialz. And then i take crack. I go to my house and say “oh shit my keys i forgot” and i get my keygen out to make keys. Then i figure out what to warez. Then theres a thunderstorm that drowns me like a torrent. Yes, i know this is crappy lol junk.

Read full topic

item.title: Fastest Food Ever
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

[quote=“Bang Train, post:8, topic:119283”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=168715.msg1566166#msg1566166 date=1183483382]

PaulT:

You shall then proceed to run back out toward Wendy’s and say “I almost got the bastard but the filthy fast food freak escaped!”.

Ahaaha!

Well my version of fast food is cerial and milk. I use extra milk in bowl 1 and refill when I’m empty. Good to go.
[/quote]
whats in bowl 2?[/quote]
[me=pko]thinks weed[/me]

Read full topic
